basic_flat_buffer::operator= (1 of 3 overloads)

Move Assignment.

Synopsis 
basic_flat_buffer&
operator=(
    basic_flat_buffer&& other);
Description

The container is assigned with the contents of other using move semantics. The maximum size will be the same as the moved-from object. Buffer sequences previously obtained from other using data or prepare remain valid after the move.

Parameters

Name

Description

other

The object to move from. After the move, the moved-from object will have zero capacity, zero readable bytes, and zero writable bytes.

Exception Safety

No-throw guarantee.
